config.description: The name to appear in the header (and throughout the App) that appears to the right of the Platform Name or Logo.
config.label: App Name

config.description: The overall platform name. This only appears if the logo is set to not appear.
config.label: Platform Name

config.description: Whether to display the platforms Logo or use the Platform Name.
config.label: Display Platform Logo

config.description: A URL for retrieving the Platform Logo.
config.label: Logo URL

description: Configure the customizations to this particular instance of Flow and maximise the experience for your users.
name: Configure Customizations
